/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches out ahead, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The trees, a mix of green and brown, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sun, positioned in the top right corner of the image, casts long shadows and highlights the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
